rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A minimalist entry with Vastu compliant design to welcome positive energy. Open space to facilitate smooth flow of movement.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area designed in a minimalist style with open seating arrangements and integrated storage, oriented according to Vastu for prosperity.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining space adjoining the living room. Minimalist decor with Vastu oriented seating arrangement facing the main entrance.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: Two-car garage designed to accommodate vehicles efficiently and ensuring easy ingress/egress in alignment with local building norms.

openings.description: Vastu aligned main entrance to invite positive energy.
A well-placed window to maximize natural light and ventilation.
Connects the living room and dining area, ensuring smooth movement.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with built-in wardrobes. Designed according to Vastu guidelines with calming colors and minimal furnishings.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Sufficient space for a guest or family member, aligned with minimalist design principles and Vastu orientation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Functional bedroom with adequate storage, minimal decor following Vastu practices.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Integrated bathroom for the master bedroom ensuring privacy and adherence to local building codes.

openings.description: Ensures proper ventilation and light, aligned with Vastu.
A small balcony for fresh air and an exterior view.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Modern home theater with state-of-the-art sound system, minimalist design and Vastu compliance for balanced energy.

rooms.name: Study Room
rooms.description: Dedicated study space optimized for productivity and calm environment, following minimalist design principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional guest room with essential amenities. Minimalistic in design and Vastu oriented.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Space for laundry and storage, designed to maintain functionality without clutter.

openings.description: Natural light enhances the home theater ambiance.
Provides access between study and guest bedroom.
